purpleculture_pinyin:
chī
variant of 吃 ; to eat; to have one's meal; to eradicate; to destroy; to absorb; to suffer; to exhaust
вариант 吃; есть; поесть; искоренить; разрушать; Абсорбировать; страдать; исчерпать
rtega_mnemonic:
喫喫RSeat, drink, suffer, endure, bear, smoke
  • contract 契 giving you provisions to eat 口 or smoke (also via the mouth 口) or leading you to suffer
heisig_constituent: consume, mouth, pledge, flick knife, grow up, dagger, large, St. Bernard
Keyword_KANJIDIC: consume, eat, drink, smoke, receive (a blow)
koohiiStory1: This means eat/drink/smoke. Maybe you make a pledge to stop gutsing/binging/puffing, but your own mouth is tempting you to put something in it.
koohiiStory2: I make my mouth pledge to consume less.
jp_example_words:
喫茶(きっさ): tea drinking, tea house
喫茶店(きっさてん): coffee shop
WaniKani_Radicals: 口, 生, 刀, 大
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In your mouth you put your life on the line by putting in a sword that is big. You put it all the way down there, so you consume it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself doing a magic trick where you put a big sword in your mouth. You say: "Now, for my next illusion, I will consume a sword!"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The "consume a sword" illusion came with a cheap magic kit (きつ) you had.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's odd that there would be a "consume a sword" trick in your magic kit. It seems so real for a kit you can buy at the store.
Ru_Meaning: consume, eat, drink, smoke, receive (a blow)

  • курить, втягивать дым

  • место для курения

    喫煙家きつえんか
  • курильщик, курящий
    • warodai
    満喫するまんきつする
  • кн. быть сытым, есть и пить досыта, вполне насытиться, перен. иметь в достаточном количестве, полностью насладиться чем-л., вкусить в полной мере
    • warodai
    喫驚びっくり
  • поражаться, пугаться
    • jr-edict

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the mouth (口) pledges (契) not to eat / drink / smoke

喫字的基本解释

喫
chī
同“吃”。

喫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chī］
亦作“噄1”。同“吃1”。
[②]［kài］
［《集韻》口賣切，去卦，溪。］
亦作“噄2”。
见“喫2詬”。

喫字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　喫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页200第19
【唐韻】【正韻】苦擊切【集韻】【韻會】喆歷切，?音燩。【說文】食也。【玉篇】啖，喫也。【杜甫·絕句】梅熟許同朱老喫。　又【正韻】飲也。【杜甫·送李校書詩】對酒不能喫。　【廣韻】同?。【集韻】或作?噭。【正韻】亦作毄。　又【集韻】口賣切，音?。喫詬，力諍。　又口戒切，音烗。義同。

喫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
喫字的起名意思

暂无。

chī
вм. 吃
Radicals: 口, 生, 刀, 大  (mouth, life, sword, big)
Meaning Mnemonic
In your mouth you put your life on the line by putting in a sword that is big. You put it all the way down there, so you consume it.
Imagine yourself doing a magic trick where you put a big sword in your mouth. You say: "Now, for my next illusion, I will consume a sword!"
Reading Mnemonic
The "consume a sword" illusion came with a cheap magic kit (きつ) you had.
It's odd that there would be a "consume a sword" trick in your magic kit. It seems so real for a kit you can buy at the store.
